blogPost.excerpt: Just a curated list of the best games to play on your next video call Built during another lockdown in the UK, hopefully these games get you through your next awkward work social as they have for us... By https://shoreditchdesignstudio.com/, illustrations by https://craftwork.design/

blogPost.title: Zoom Games - Curated and filterable list of games to try on video calls
blogPost.author: Andrew Burton

localize.description: 只是一个最好的游戏，在你的下一个视频通话的策划列表 建立在另一个锁定在英国，希望这些游戏让你通过你的下一个尴尬的工作社交，因为他们已经为我们......。作者：https://shoreditchdesignstudio.com/，插图：https://craftwork.design/
localize.tagline: 策划并可过滤的游戏列表，可在视频通话中尝试。

localize.description: 只是一個最好的遊戲，在你的下一個視頻通話的策劃列表 建立在另一個鎖定在英國，希望這些遊戲讓你通過你的下一個尷尬的工作社交，因爲他們已經爲我們......。作者：https://shoreditchdesignstudio.com/，插圖：https://craftwork.design/
localize.tagline: 策劃並可過濾的遊戲列表，可在視頻通話中嘗試。

previous.excerpt: ZelaaPayAE crypto cards allow for transactions online and in brick-and-mortar establishments at market rates, backed by our cryptocurrency ZPAE. With the ZPAYae card, you can immediately exchange fiat to crypto and then pay directly for your goods or send it to a friend.
